title: The Beauty of effort = La Beaute de l'effort
creator_credit: Natfilm, Robert Hakim, Raymond Hakim and Marc de Gastyne
brief_description: Modern athletes movements are demonstrated in slow motion to illustrate the beauty of athletic sports, their special forms, their grace and their power. Tours French training centres for physical education instructors at Antibes, Joinville, Bordeaux and Poitiers. French language - no subtitles.
